Cluster-based system¶

  • Slurm
  • LSF
class pyper.modules.system.cluster.Cluster(section: str)¶

base class for cluster based systems

_execute()¶

Main function called by job script, execute all stages.

_finalize(ij: str, idx: str, time_start: float)¶

Callback when task ended successfully.

Parameters

  • {str} -- id of task (ij) –

  • {str} -- index of task in current stage (idx) –

  • {float} -- task start time (time_start) –

Command for job submission.

Parameters

{str} -- path of job script (src) –

Returns

str – job submission command

abstract _jobscript(script: str) → str¶

Create job script.

Parameters

{str} -- main content of job script (script) –

Returns

str – full job script content

abstract _mpiexec(cmd: str, nnodes: int, nprocs: int) → str¶

Command for running tasks with multiple processors

Parameters

  • {str} -- command to be executed (cmd) –

  • {int} -- number of nodes for the command (nnodes) –

  • {int} -- total number of processors for the command (nprocs) –

Returns

str – task execution command

mpirun(tasks: Union[List[Tuple[str, str, int]], Tuple[str, str, int]])¶

Run mpi tasks.

Parameters

{Union[List[Tuple[str, str, int]], Tuple[str, str, int]]} -- path, command and number of processors (tasks) –

Returns

int – exit code of the system call
